verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Blows the wind, by and by
Cover me and my brother's love.
Steal my heart from troubled moments,
Wash me clean, wash me clean...

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Blows the wind, the Living Spirit,
Fill my sails and take me on,
Deeper still into my Father,
Blows the wind, blows the wind.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Blows the wind, not where it wants to,
But where it must, by the Master's hand.
And He takes His faithful to Him,
Back to Him; back to Him.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Come ye wind, blow through my timbers,
Tremble me from branch to root.
Make me strong for the battle.
Come ye wind, come ye wind.
